Author: yoyo12356032
Text: I think most of us in this sub are in the sam position as you...I can encourage you on all the different ways to seek help, but then, would that make me a hypocrite? I’ve struggled with bulimia on and off for 12 years and 5 years ago is when it started getting really bad. I can’t go a day without doing it and I feel like it has taken control over my life. At this point, I’ve given up hope that I will ever get better.   Can you talk to a doctor? Maybe go to a support group?  If you feel like you have any control left, I pray that you will get help before it gets worse. ... because it will. ❤️
